detailIntroText: Chiliz is a blockchain fintech provider for sports and entertainment. They have developed the blockchain-based fan engagement and rewards platform Socios.com, which is built on the Chiliz blockchain infrastructure and uses CHZ as its exclusive on-platform currency. Fans can purchase and trade branded Fan Tokens, as well as having the ability to participate, influence, and vote in club-focused surveys and polls. Chiliz aims to create a blockchain ecosystem built for sports and entertainment.
introduceText: Blockchain Fintech Provider for Sports and Entertainment
